reference.title: GetMsgInfo : Retrieves the message parameters from the loaded database, given the message name

section.title: Description
section.p: This function will get the details about a database message.

section.title: Inputs
section.p: Message name, Structure sMESSAGESTRUCT { double m_dMessageCode; double m_dNumberOfSignals; double m_dMessageLength; BOOL m_bMessageFrameFormat; int m_nMsgDataFormat; }

section.title: Cause of failure
section.p: message name not in database,data base file is not imported to BUSMASTER
